poem:
Title: "Spun Uprising"

In the loom of global trade,
Vodafone, crimson thread,
twisted by Emirates' hand.
National anxieties twine,
held in the precarious weave-
a tapestry of risk, unspun.

Turbulent, this 14.6% stake,
a storm in the desert, heard
in unseen boardrooms.
Unfold the spinning wheel, insist
nervous ministers. Safeguard, they urge,
the invisible threads of our tongues.
